channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Wobbly paving slab by tree, 10th June
item.description:
This is on Oaks Avenue near the junction with Gipsy hill (opposite side of the road to Oakdene Court) by a tree and new black asphalt Slab is wobbly and potentially dangerous as someone could fall

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oaks Avenue, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large sinkhole opening up in the middle of the lane of traffic travelling towards elephant &castle, 10th June
item.description:
Large sinkhole opening up in the middle of the lane of traffic travelling towards elephant &castle Impossible to get a photo but it is big and could easily be 1/2 the depth of a small tyre - it would cause a motorbike or bike or moped to tip a rider off.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Kennington Lane, Kennington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rat infestation in communal bin area, 9th June
item.description:
We are unable to dispose of rubbish as we have had a rat infestation in the communal bin area for many months. Has been reported to housing association but yet, nothing had been done.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sheep Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy manhole cover, 9th June
item.description:
There is a manhole at the traffic lights on norwood road heading upto tule hill which makes a loud bang everytime a car drives over it. It's got worse and I can hear it when trying to sleep at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Norwood Road, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress, garden waste and machinery, 9th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13-56, Tyers Gate, The Borough, London

item.title: On the corner outside 2 malden road/132 powr, by the end of the blue painted bike lane, 9th June
item.description:
